settings.richtext:
Thank you for visiting and shopping at Pai Technology. Following are the terms and conditions that constitute our Shipping Policy.

Domestic Shipping Policy (UK)

Shipping charges for your order will be calculated and displayed at checkout.

* Overnight delivery is only available for orders with delivery addresses within the continental United Kingdom.

Delivery delays can occasionally occur.
United Kingdom. However, there are exceptions, such as delivery being unavailable to PO Boxes and US military zones APO, AP, FPO, AA.
We don't currently ship to the UK, product display only!
